itemDescription: 1903–1969; British-born American film editor and film director

wikipedia_page.main: John Wilkinson English (25 June 1903 – 11 October 1969) was a British film editor and film director.  He is most famous for the film serials he co-directed with William Witney for Republic Pictures such as Zorro's Fighting Legion and Drums of Fu Manchu.He was credited variously as John W English, John English or Jack English.
